headline: Chipotle Revives Chicken Al Pastor To Support 2026 Menu Growth Plan
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE:CMG) is bringing back its Chicken al Pastor as a limited-time menu item across multiple countries. The relaunch is tied to the company’s broader plan to speed up its 2026 schedule for new limited-time offerings. Management is using rotating menu items to support customer engagement and keep the brand front of mind globally. For investors watching NYSE:CMG, the Chicken al Pastor return comes as the stock trades at $38.87, with a 5.1% return over the past 30 days...
